name: SuperShapeSwarm20XX
description:
A game where you're a shape, picking up other shapes, nuff said.

WASD/Arrow Keys to Move

QE/ZX to change shape type

If it's too small, zoom in your browser page...

Entry for Global Game Jam 2017

Credits:
Programming, Design, Sound Effects:
Drunk Alvin Phu
Sober Alvin Phu

Sprites:
Oryx - LOFI Roguelike

Music:
Windy Bluffs - Visager
